ingredients.content: 200 g onions, cut into pieces (3-4 cm)
600 - 700 g chicken in pieces (drumsticks, thighs, breast cut into pieces of 4-5 cm)
4 sprigs fresh parsley, leaves washed and dried, plus extra for garnish

preparations.content: Place garlic and onions into mixing bowl, chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add olive oil and sauté <b>5 min/120°C/speed 1<b>.
Add chicken drumsticks and thighs, lemon zest and juice, parsley, water, cumin, saffron, paprika, turmeric, cinnamon, salt and pepper and cook <b>10 min/100°C//speed <b>.
Add chicken breast and cook <b>10 min/90°C//speed <b>.
Add olives, cook <b>1 min/100°C//speed <b>. Decorate with parsley leaves and serve.
